definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[פַּרְשֵׂז]] (Baer, [[שֵׁז]]- van d. H. Gi), Inf. abs.

definitions.title: Pi‘lēl
definitions.body: (Ges:§ 56) from [[פָּרַשׂ]] (si vera l.) [[עָלָיו עֲנָנוֹ]] ´[[פ]] Job 26:9 a spreading his cloud upon it (but Bu Du al. read [[פּׂרֵשׂ]], [[פָּרַשׂ]], or [[פָרשׁׂ]]).
